name: CogniForge: The Definitive Supercharged Environment v3.0
postCreateCommand: echo '>>> [DevContainer] Building base Docker images...' && docker-compose build
postStartCommand: echo '>>> [DevContainer] Starting all services in detached mode...' && docker-compose up -d

postAttachCommand.db-setup: echo '>>> [DevContainer] Initializing and migrating database...' && docker-compose run --rm migrations
